title: 圣诞改歌《Jinping San is Coming to Town》
contents:
原曲：Santa Claus is Coming to Town
纯音乐：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f1GSdBOxyiw

you better watch out
you better not cry
please keep your mouth shut
I’m telling you why
Jinping San is coming to town

He’s making a list (a list!)
He’s checking it twice (twice!)
Making sure he gets all the tigers and flies (die!)
Jinping San is coming to town~

He sees you when you’re sleeping (yes!)
He hears you when you’re awake (for sure!)
He know the things you’ve said and done
So just please try to behave (*showing all the security cameras*)

You better not shout
you better feel fright
you better send gift
I’m telling you why
Jinping San is coming to town~
(Oh let’s go!)

(chorus)
we praise him when he’s sleeping
we ‘dore him when he’s ‘wake
we go and earn the fifty cents
for our house and goodness’s sake (It's a Christmas!)

you better watch out
you better speak light
just shut up your mouth
(speak together) we're telling you why!
Jiping San is coming to town~ (yeah!)
